txt.en:
'The things you helped recover will bring good coin at auction, but the raiders ensured that it will not be enough. I will need more if I am to make the kind of money needed to pay off my debts and ascend within the clan. Only then can I hope to sway them away from the Wizard's murmurings.

'I have a homestead, just west of here over the ridge. We farm and raise livestock. Take the ledger to my son. He should be able to show you where everything is and help you pack it all up.

'I am moving on to Avardin to the south. Come and find me there once everything is in order.'

'You say my father sent you? I hope you are skilled with a weapon. The Dragon-clan must have heard that he was gone, for they have begun to raid the farm. It was all that I could do to sneak down here unseen.'
Andras has told you about his homestead in the north-west of the Starkmoor.
Talk to Andras' son at his farmstead
Andras' homestead is in the north-west of the Starkmoor.\n\nAndras asked you go to his homestead and give the ledger to his son.
